com.meta64.mobile.service

Class AttachmentService

  • Object
    • AttachmentService

  • @Component
public class AttachmentService
extends Object
    Service for managing node attachments.

    Node attachments are binary attachments that the user can opload onto a node. Each node allows either zero or one attachments. Uploading a new attachment wipes out and replaces the previous attachment. If the attachment is an 'image' type then it gets displayed right on the page. Otherwise a download link is what gets displayed on the node.
